channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 2718b1f7-eb07-424e-8868-0137541392a1
Display name: Landing Zone Account Reader
Description: Microsoft.Sovereign Landing Zone Account Reader allowing to read Landing Zone Account, Landing Zone Configurations and Landing Zone Registrations. Also enables read-access to policies and management groups for enabling the full user experience of the Sovereign Services RP in the Azure Portal (as otherwise some elements might not be accessible to end users).
Link: https://management.azure.com/2718b1f7-eb07-424e-8868-0137541392a1?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: bf2b6809-e9a5-4aea-a6e1-40a9dc8c43a7
Display name: Landing Zone Account Owner
Description: Microsoft.Sovereign Landing Zone Account Owner allowing to review and modify Landing Zone Account, Landing Zone Configurations, as well as reading and adding Landing Zone Registrations. Also enables read-access to policies and management groups for enabling the full user experience of the Sovereign Services RP in the Azure Portal (as otherwise some elements might not be accessible to end users).
Link: https://management.azure.com/bf2b6809-e9a5-4aea-a6e1-40a9dc8c43a7?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 21bffb94-04c0-4ed0-b676-68bb926e832b
Display name: Microsoft.Windows365.CloudPcDelegatedMsis Writer User
Description: Built in role to perform Write operations on CloudPcDelegatedMsis resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/21bffb94-04c0-4ed0-b676-68bb926e832b?api-version=2022-04-01
